text:
While a source told us that Whitney was "heartbroken," Chris sounded pretty broken up too.

"When I [got down] on one knee, I thought that was it," he told Entertainment Tonight after the split. "[But] once it's all said and done, you do get to a new reality after the show's over. Then you start to learn and figure out if the relationship's actually going to work. So, having it not work wa...
title: Chris Soules' Isolated World After The Bachelor: When Reality TV Stardom Doesn't Do Much but Crank Up the Spotlight
